batch(bytes[]).details: The `msg.value` should not be trusted for any method callable from this function.

params.data: ABI-encoded params for each of the calls to make to this contract.

returns.results: The results from each of the calls passed in via `data`.

migrate(address,uint256,uint256,bool,uin.details: If the pool with the current conditions doesn't exist it will be deployed.

params.amount: Liquidity amount (Lp token balance) to be migrated.
params.minReceived: Slippage protection for minting liquidity on the Trident CP pool.
params.pair: Uniswap V2 style liquidity pool address.
params.swapFee: Swap fee of the Trident CP pool we are migrating into.
params.twapSupport: Whether the Trident CP pool we are migrating into supports twap oracles.

params.amount: Token amount to grant spending right over.
params.deadline: Termination for signed approval (UTC timestamp in seconds).
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature.

params.expiry: Termination for signed approval - UTC timestamp in seconds.
params.nonce: Token owner's nonce - increases at each call to {permit}.
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature.

batch(bytes[]).notice: Provides batch function calls for this contract and returns the data from all of them if they all succeed. Adapted from https://github.com/Uniswap/uniswap-v3-periphery/blob/main/contracts/base/Multicall.sol, License-Identifier: GPL-2.0-or-later.

migrate(address,uint256,uint256,bool,uin.notice: Function to migrate existing Sushiswap or other Uniswap V2 style pools to Trident.

permitThis(address,uint256,uint256,uint8.notice: Provides EIP-2612 signed approval for this contract to spend user tokens.

permitThisAllowed(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Provides DAI-derived signed approval for this contract to spend user tokens.

userdoc.notice: Liquidity migrator from UniV2 style pool to Trident Constant product pool.
